seventh is called Thomas this
disciplined quality doubts or denies

not because of inherited health diets or

belonged had any power to affect him
this quality of denial when discipline
protects man from receiving impressions

he adopts an attitude of total
indifference to all suggestions that are

express discipline denial is not a fight
or a struggle but total indifference
